alert.note: Alert for Greene; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 26 at 7:59PM CST until February 28 at 4:30AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Sumter and Marengo Counties. Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Pickens and Sumter Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo, Sumter and Hale Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and flood warnings remains in effect. The river has crested at Bevill Lock and Dam and Gainesville Lock and Dam, and is approaching crest at Demopolis Lock and Dam. Another statement will be issued by Sunday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 101.0 feet, Flooding of low lying agricultural and wooded lands in the area occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Saturday the stage was 101.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM CST Saturday was 102.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 101.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
